title: Bug 6125 - JAR packager reports open files very late
description: When I press 'finish' in the JAR packager wizard, the following error message appears: 'JAR creation failed: Unsaved Editors'.
OB: The JAR packager fails to create the JAR file if there are unsaved editors open.
EB: I expect to be able to create a JAR file even if there are unsaved editors open. If there are unsaved editors, there should be a dialog that allows me to save them before proceeding with the JAR packager.
SR:
To reproduce the issue, follow these steps:
1. Open the JAR packager wizard.
2. Leave some editors unsaved.
3. Enter all the necessary fields.
4. Click on the 'finish' button.
